property.name: rulesFailedMessage
property.string: The installer cannot run on your configuration. It will now quit.

property.name: prompt
property.string: Welcome to Ariba Upstream MultiServer configuration.To Configure logicat nodes in a multiserver environment , click Next.

property.name: prompt
property.string: Please Choose the Upstream Installation Location

property.name: additionalText
property.string: For MultiServer Configuration to work , Ariba Upstream Installation root directory need to be specified.

property.name: installSuccessMessage
property.string:
Congratulations! $PRODUCT_NAME$ has been successfully installed to:
$INSTALLATION_DIR$
Press "Done" to quit the installer.

property.name: installWarningMessage
property.string: The installation of $PRODUCT_NAME$ is finished, but some warnings occurred during the install. Please see the installation log for details.

property.name: installErrorMessage
property.string: The installation of $PRODUCT_NAME$ is finished, but some errors occurred during the install. Please see the installation log for details.

property.name: installFatalMessage
property.string: The installation of $PRODUCT_NAME$ is finished, but some serious errors occurred during the install. Please see the installation log for details.

property.name: rebootRecommendedMessage
property.string: You should restart the system to complete the installation.

property.name: rebootRequiredMessage
property.string: You need to restart the system to complete the installation.

property.name: description
property.string: Choose this option to customize the features to be installed.

property.name: message
property.string:
About to uninstall...
$PRODUCT_NAME$
This will remove features installed by InstallAnywhere. It will not remove files and folders created after the installation.

property.name: allDescription
property.string: Completely remove all features and components of $PRODUCT_NAME$ that were installed by InstallAnywhere. Files and folders created after the installation will not be affected.

property.name: someDescription
property.string: Choose specific features of $PRODUCT_NAME$ that were installed by InstallAnywhere to be uninstalled.

property.name: instructions
property.string: Please select one of the following options:

property.name: checkInstructions
property.string: Check features that you want to uninstall. Unchecked features will remain installed.

property.name: uncheckInstructions
property.string: Uncheck features that you want to uninstall. Checked features will remain installed.

property.name: uninstallIncompleteMessage
property.string: The following items could not be removed:

property.name: rebootRecommendedMessage
property.string: You should restart the system to complete the uninstallation.

property.name: rebootRequiredMessage
property.string: You need to restart the system to complete the uninstallation.

property.name: description
property.string: The most common application features will be installed. This option is recommended for most users.

property.name: comment
property.string: This component holds resources (e.g., files, folders, actions) common to all Product Features

property.name: comment
property.string: This component is intended to hold this project's Uninstaller and any resources specific to the uninstallation of the product installed by this project

property.name: dependencyFailedMessage
property.string: InstallAnywhere Uninstall Component dependency has failed.

property.name: comment
property.string: <Enter Install Component comment here -- do not forget to assign this Component to desired Product Features>

property.name: dependencyFailedMessage
property.string: InstallAnywhere VM Component dependency has failed.

property.name: comment
property.string: This component was automatically created when the developer assigned actions to features-This installs the help feature.

property.name: description
property.string: Only required application features will be installed. This option is recommended only for users with limited disk space.

property.name: comment
property.string: This component represents all actions not currently assigned to a feature

property.name: dependencyFailedMessage
property.string: No Features Component dependency has failed.
